creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: wooden calligraphy box with two stems of bright blue flowers with green leaves and gold veins; includes brush, silver weight or brush rest, wooden tool rest, two metal and wood tools, green ceramic ink stone, and yellow ceramic water dripper
markings: impressed seals LLC of box (b); LLC of wooden block (h); back of ink dish (j) and back of water dripper (k)
medium: Colors on Paulownia wood, glazed stoneware, silver, wood, metal
title: (Calligraphy Box Decorated with Gentians Painted by Sekka)
